title: What is the scope of population education and environmental education? - Quora

response.answer_text: Population issues have a large bearing on environmental education. The two are symbiotic in many respects and impact on each other. Population education in developing countries of Africa, Asia and Latin America will concentrate on Population increase and its impact on natural resourcesPopulation and the carrying capacity of countries and regionsDemography and environmental impactsDemography, migration and climate changeSustainable development and rapid population increaseNatural resource management and cultural perspectivesSlums and waste management in cities and built up areas
